title: Diabetic Nerve Pain Treatment
subtitle: Discover the best treatment program that takes you from the suffering you're living today to a better state so you can enjoy life — treat the pain and enjoy your life.
instructor-desc-1: Consultant and global expert in pain management, especially neuropathic pain, from the University of Toronto, Canada. Published numerous scientific papers in prestigious medical journals.
instructor-desc-2: Author of several specialized books in pain management.
instructor-exp: Member of the Canadian Pain Society.
instructor-patients: Founder and head of pain treatment units in several countries.
instructor-awards: Over thirty years of experience treating thousands of cases.
goal-1: Why does the suffering from diabetic neuropathy persist?
goal-2: The integrated treatment program that achieved the best results
goal-3: True stories of patients whose lives changed for the better
audience-title: This webinar is for diabetic patients
audience-1: You've seen doctors and taken medications but are still unhappy with the results
audience-2: You suffer from burning pain in your hands and feet
audience-4: Difficulty sleeping and not enjoying life

testimonials_subtitle: What patients say about their treatment experience
testimonial_1_text: Thanks to God and then to Dr. Abdul Hamid's treatment program, I regained my normal life after years of suffering from nerve pain.
testimonial_2_text: I suffered from severe burning in my feet that prevented me from sleeping, and now thanks to the treatment I can sleep and live normally.
testimonial_3_text: I tried many treatments without benefit, but after following the doctor's program I felt a great improvement within a few weeks.
faq_q1_question: Is the seminar free or paid?
faq_q1_answer: The seminar is completely free with no attendance fees. We aim to spread knowledge and help treat as many patients as possible.
faq_q2_question: How can I attend the seminar?
faq_q2_answer: After registration, you will receive the seminar access link via email and a WhatsApp message one hour before the event.
faq_q3_question: Can I watch the seminar later if I miss it?
faq_q3_answer: Yes, you will receive a recording link after the seminar ends if you registered in advance, but we recommend live attendance to benefit from the opportunity to ask the doctor questions directly.
